meanings.sent1: He cudgelled the rug to get the dust out.
meanings.sent2: The thief cudgelled the door to break it open.
meanings.sent3: The chef cudgelled the dough to make it soft and fluffy.
meanings.sent4: The waves cudgelled the shore relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: She cudgelled the pillow to fluff it up before sleeping.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he cudgelled the thief who tried to break in.
meanings.sent2: She cudgelled the weeds in the garden last week.
meanings.sent3: The cat cudgelled the yarn ball into a mess.
meanings.sent4: The storm cudgelled the trees, leaving a trail of destruction.
meanings.sent5: The old man cudgelled the drum with skill and precision.
